name: Global Business of Data Festival - Digital Broadcast Event - Europe (19-20 January, 2022)
content: Join us and experience an unforgettable broadcast full of inspiration and ideas, as we stream a series of discussions featuring perspectives from data and analytics leaders from across the world. The Global Business of Data Festival is not a webinar. Not a Zoom or Teams call. Not a virtual conference. There will be no presentations. This exclusive and ambitious digital broadcast has been curated to provide inspirational content in a variety of bite-size formats recorded with guests from across the world. A digitally broadcast event, featuring engaging, unique content and perspectives. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/955009-0?pid=4868 Price: Free: GBP 0.0
